Column="aptTrackingDomainType" TableAlias="event1" /> </BasicCondition> <BasicCondition Operator="Is" JoinCondition="No" Negated="No" IgnoreCase="No" ListCompare="ANY"> <Variable Column="getAdditionalList____0" TableAlias="event1" /> <Value>NOT NULL</Value> </BasicCondition> <BasicCondition Operator="In" JoinCondition="No" Negated="No" IgnoreCase="No" ListCompare="ANY"> Rule.def: <Rule Name="Command and Control Multiband Communication" Type="Normal" ID="5bss7qXABABCLIBoa+1FGJg=="> <Description>Some adversaries may split communications between different protocols. There could be one protocol for inbound command and control and another for outbound data, allowing it to bypass certain firewall restrictions. The split could also be random to simply avoid data threshold alerts on any one communication. This rule is dependent on the rule /All Rules/ArcSight Foundation/Threat Intelligence Platform/Botnet Activity/Inbound Suspicious Traffic.</Description> <Query> <FromClause> <Table Name="Event" Rule.def: <Rule Name="Track ATAP Connector Update Count" Type="Lightweight" ID="5zsIho4IBABCXRBJltWCeIA=="> <Description>This rule tracks ATAP connector update count, and write to an active list.</Description> <Query> <FromClause> <Table Name="Event" Alias="event1" AliasType="Positive" /> </FromClause> <WhereClause TimeWindowSize="2" TimeUnit="Minute" Threshold="1"> <Condition ConditionType="Positive" TableAlias="event1"> <And Name="And1875298701"> <BasicCondition Operator="EQ" JoinCondition="No" Negated="No" IgnoreCase="No" ListCompare="ANY"> <Variable Column="deviceEventClassId" TableAlias="event1" /> <Value>agent:050</Value> </BasicCondition> <BasicCondition Operator="EQ" JoinCondition="No" Negated="No" IgnoreCase="No" ListCompare="ANY"> <Variable Column="agentType" TableAlias="event1" /> <Value>model_mispapi</Value> </BasicCondition> <BasicCondition Operator="EQ" JoinCondition="No" Negated="No" IgnoreCase="No" ListCompare="ANY"> <Variable Column="type" TableAlias="event1" /> <Value>Base</Value> </BasicCondition> </And> </Condition> </WhereClause> </Query> <Actions> <Action Event="OnEveryEvent"> <SendToConsole /> </Action> <Action Event="OnEveryEvent"> <AddToList> <ActionParameter Name="Field" Value="agentName" /> <ActionParameter Name="Field" Value="dayAndHour" /> <ActionParameter Name="Field" Value="updateCount" /> <Resource ID="HkKcno4IBABCXStt-R0oY4A==" URI="/All Active Lists/ArcSight Foundation/Threat Intelligence Platform/IoC Data Update by Hour" /> </AddToList> </Action> </Actions> <DependentVariables> <BaseIntrospector Name="com.arcsight.event.SecurityEvent" /> <DependentVariable FunctionName="parse_timestamp" FieldName="dayAndHour" FieldDisplayName="dayAndHour"> <FunctionFieldVariable Column="managerReceiptTime" /> <FunctionFieldValue Type="String"><![CDATA[get_year_month_day_hh]]></FunctionFieldValue> </DependentVariable> <DependentVariable FunctionName="subtract" FieldName="DCN3Subtract2" FieldDisplayName="DCN3Subtract2"> <FunctionFieldVariable Column="deviceCustomNumber3" /> <FunctionFieldValue Type="Integer">2</FunctionFieldValue> </DependentVariable> <DependentVariable FunctionName="custom_condition_function" FieldName="updateCount" FieldDisplayName="updateCount"> <ZoneDefinition>'deviceCustomNumber3' GE 2</ZoneDefinition> <FunctionFieldVariable Column="DCN3Subtract2" /> <FunctionFieldVariable Column="deviceCustomNumber3" /> </DependentVariable> </DependentVariables> </Rule>

ActiveList.name: Track ATAP Connector

ref.uri: /All Active Lists/ArcSight Foundation/Threat Intelligence Platform/
/All Database Table Schemas/System Database Table Schemas/Active Lists/7.2.1.2648.0/Generic/TrackType-String-k/H/Active List Tuple Schema

ActiveList.description:
This list stores information when the ATAP SmartConnector receives or processes data.
By default, the connector downloads data every two hours, as a result, the TTL is 2 hours 5 minutes. If entries are not updated after TTL, which means something is wrong with connector, a rule will be triggered by audit even from expired entries.
If the interval of connector is modified, please change TTL accordingly.

ref.uri: /All Rules/ArcSight Foundation/Threat Intelligence Platform/ATAP Connector Health/Track ATAP Connector Service Message

UseCase.use_case_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <!DOCTYPE ArstUseCase SYSTEM "schema/xml/arcsight-usecase.dtd"> <ArstUseCase version="1.5">
<Introduction>This use case detects threat based on intelligence data collected from MISP. This configuration wizard guides you through these configuration tasks: *Check for required event sources *Categorize zones you want to monitor </Introduction>
<Prerequisite>This use case requires to install MIC which will import/update MISP intelligence data into server. It also requires to define indicator types for each use case in the list /All Active Lists/ArcSight Foundation/Common/Suspicious Indicator Types</Prerequisite>
<Requirements> <EventSource> <DeviceClass name="Firewall" /> <DeviceClass name="IDS/IPS" /> <DeviceClass name="Operating System" /> <DeviceClass name="Web Proxy" /> </EventSource> </Requirements>
<Processing> <Configurations> <Optional> <Action type="categorizeZones" title="Categorize Protected Zones" question="Select the zones that contain internal network assets to categorize them as Protected."> <Resource uri="/All Asset Categories/Site Asset Categories/Address Spaces/Protected" id="0xtpDifsAABCAXiBhJx+nsA==" /> <Property name="categorizeAssets"> <Parameter name="ID" value="ZonesCategorized" /> <Parameter name="hint" value="This phase can be skipped." /> <Parameter name="shortname" value="ZoneName" /> <Parameter name="default" value="" /> </Property> </Action> </Optional> </Configurations> <Summary>Zones Categorized: ${ZonesCategorized} </Summary> </Processing> </ArstUseCase>
